title: Visual bug - summoner name in lobby

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
In the lead-up to this bug:

1. I already had the League of Legends client open and logged in.
2. A new driver for Nvidia Geforce (version 375.86, release date 11/15/2016) became available so I downloaded and installed it.
3. The League of Legends client became unavailable to restore to the desktop so I closed it.
4. Upon re-opening and logging into the client again, I was invited to a match by a friend and the supplied screenshot was the result.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is a common issue relating to the AIR client, I believe this has been resolved in the new client.
